Class GridCacheOffheapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.IgniteCacheOffheapManagerImpl
      • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.GridCacheOffheapManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IgniteCacheOffheapManager, DbCheckpointListener

    public class GridCacheOffheapManager
extends IgniteCacheOffheapManagerImpl
implements DbCheckpointListener
    Used when persistence enabled.

      • destroyPartitionStore

        public void destroyPartitionStore(int grpId,
                                  int partId)
                           throws IgniteCheckedException
        Invalidates page memory for given partition. Destroys partition store. NOTE: This method can be invoked only within checkpoint lock or checkpointer thread.
        Parameters:
        grpId - Group ID.
        partId - Partition ID.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If destroy has failed.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
